&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; &EnvironmentTaxDeclare;
declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, b.ma_thue, c.thue_suat, b.ma_thue_nk, c.thue_suat as thue_suat_nk, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, rtrim(m.ma_vung) as ma_vung, a.loai_dt, a.ct_dt_pb, d.ten_loai%l, d.kieu_pb &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&EnvironmentTaxFields; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d91$000000 a cross join dmvt b cross join dmthue c cross join bidmlcddt d&EnvironmentTaxJoin; cross join m91$000000 m
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(b.ma_thue) as ma_thue, isnull(t2.thue_suat, 0) as thue_suat, rtrim(b.ma_thue_nk) as ma_thue_nk, isnull(t1.thue_suat, 0) as thue_suat_nk, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, rtrim(m.ma_vung) as ma_vung, rtrim(a.loai_dt), a.ct_dt_pb, rtrim(d.ten_loai%l) as ten_loai%l, d.kieu_pb &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&EnvironmentTaxFields; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d91$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmthuenk t1 on b.ma_thue_nk = t1.ma_thue left join dmthue t2 on b.ma_thue = t2.ma_thue left join bidmlcddt d on a.loai_dt = d.ma_loai join m91$%Partition m on tr.stt_rec = m.stt_rec &EnvironmentTaxJoin; '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end &EnvironmentTaxQuery; &RetrieveGetPrice; select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField;&IRReturnFields; from #d a left join #ir ir on a.id = ir.dong &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
